title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both projects P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: The Open Project menu item should always be available when multiple projects are selected, and the Close Project menu item should be available for any project that is currently open.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select Project P2.
3. Attempt to close P2.
